SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.xylophones.micro.game.mb
Class Block

java.lang.Object
  net.xylophones.micro.game.mb.Block

public class Block
extends java.lang.Object

A class which defines the shapes of each tetrad in each possible rotation and provides methods for determining certain characteristics of each shape.

Each possible tetrad has a constant value TETRAD_I, TETRAD_J, TETRAD_L etc.

Each possible tetrad rotation constant value - one of ROTATION_0, ROTATION_90, ROTATION_180 or ROTATION_270

Combined, a tertad and a rotation have a shape. A shape is a 4x4 array of booleans, where true values represent a filled space and a false values repeesent a space.

e.g. The J tetrad in the ROTATION_0 position
tfff
tttf
ffff
ffff

Author:
william@xylophones.net

firstLeftCells

public static Point[] firstLeftCells(int tetrad,
                                     int rotation)

Get the leftmost cells of the block.

Returns an array of Point objects holding the position of each filled cell in the first column from the left which has a filled cell.

The coordinates in the Point objects are the location in the tetrad shape

Parameters:
tetrad -
rotation -
Returns:
